page.title: 12Energy
page.content: Gas is our cheapest fuel at the moment particularly as, "North Sea," gas has been piped to the town. Electricity is expensive but very clean and convenient. Not many people use coal to heat their homes now though they do like an open fire now and again. Nuclear Power is a controversial subject because many people fear that it could be dangerous, not only because of accidental leaks of radiation from power stations but also because nuclear waste could poison our planet. Solar energy does not seem to be fulfilling earlier promise but people who have solar panels in their roofs are enthusiastic about the savings in fuel bills they acheive.
